participant_1.background:
I try to have a good relationship with my family, but it can be difficult because I am often busy with work.
I joined a new gym near my home in New Mexico to continue my athletic pursuits.
i live with my boyfriend in an apartment.
i am 7 foot tall.
I sometimes spend too much time procrastinating on my homework.

participant_2.background:
I grew up in the Midwest where the summers are hot and the watermelon is sweet.
I'm not very good at keeping my apartment clean, but I love it anyway.
I enjoy comfort foods like macaroni and cheese, mashed potatoes, and chicken pot pie.
i will study computer science.
I remember the feeling of freedom when I ran through the woods behind my house as a child.

content.text: Hello! I am doing well, thank you! How about yourself?
I am good! I recently joined a new gym near my home in New Mexico.
That is exciting! I love working out. I used to go to the gym every day, but now that I am in school, I don't have as much time.
I understand! I am in school as well, but I find that working out helps me to de-stress.
That is true! I love the feeling of being energized after a workout.
Me too! I also love the feeling of accomplishment after pushing myself to do something difficult.
What is your favorite thing to do at the gym?
I love to do cardio and lift weights.
I love cardio too! I used to do a lot of running, but now I do more swimming and biking.
Swimming is great! I love the feeling of being in the water.
Me too! It is so relaxing.
